      • removeFriendship

        public abstract boolean removeFriendship(org.neo4j.graphdb.Node following,
                       org.neo4j.graphdb.Node followed)
        remove a follow edge from one user to another
        Parameters:
        following - user following, requesting the deletion
        followed - user followed
        Returns:
        true - if the follow edge has been removed
        false - if there is no follow edge between the users

      • deleteStatusUpdate

        public abstract boolean deleteStatusUpdate(org.neo4j.graphdb.Node user,
                         org.neo4j.graphdb.Node statusUpdate)
        delete a status update from a user
        Parameters:
        user - user requesting
        statusUpdate - status update
        Returns:
        true - if the status update has been removed
        false - if the status update is not owned by the user requesting
